model.name: validate
model.title: Validate
model.description: Validates a message based on an expression
model.label: eip,transformation

expression.description: Expression to use for validation as a predicate. The expression should return either true or false. If returning false the message is invalid and an exception is thrown.

predicateExceptionFactory.label: advanced
predicateExceptionFactory.description: The bean id of custom PredicateExceptionFactory to use for creating the exception when the validation fails. By default, Camel will throw PredicateValidationException. By using a custom factory you can control which exception to throw instead.

disabled.label: advanced
disabled.description: Whether to disable this EIP from the route during build time. Once an EIP has been disabled then it cannot be enabled later at runtime.

id.description: Sets the id of this node

description.description: Sets the description of this node
